events.title: OpenEnv Hackathon
events.description: The OpenEnv Hackathon will challenge participants with 10 tracks to build RL environments and enhance base model performance, backed by top-tier judges and mentors from Meta, Hugging Face, UC Berkeley, and leading AI organizations, competing for a $100K prize pool.

events.title: PyTorch Helion Hackathon
events.description: Developers, researchers, and ML engineers will explore cutting-edge GPU kernel development with Helion, PyTorch’s Python-native authoring tool that greatly simplifies high-performance ML kernel creation, alongside a sneak peek at NVIDIA’s CompileIQ for optimized code generation, supported by expert mentorship and hands-on workshops.

events.title: Nebius.Build SF
events.description: Engineers specializing in autonomous systems and high-performance inference will dive into hands-on sessions optimizing inference workloads and sim-to-real robotics builds, culminating in a hackathon judged by experts with prizes on the line. Mentors with deep technical know-how will be on hand to turbocharge team projects before GTC week.

events.title: AI+ Renᴬᴵssance Conference
events.description: Renaissance 2026 will gather 40 AI pioneers, including founders, researchers, and engineers, alongside 20+ top startups and 2,000 industry professionals to dive into breakthroughs in Multimodal Intelligence, AI Agents, Infrastructure, and Robotics.

events.title: ZeroClick Dinner for AI Builders & Operators
events.description: Leaders shaping agentic AI, including founders, C-suite executives, and product and growth heads, will explore monetization strategies and developer engagement through ZeroClick’s AI-native ad platform during an intimate evening of insightful conversations and dining.

events.title: The Agent Toolkit — OpenClaw Hack Day
events.location: AWS Builder Loft, San Francisco, CA
events.description: A full-day sprint led by AI and development pros will have developers build and ship real, publishable OpenClaw skills integrating any API, contributing to one of the fastest-growing local AI agent ecosystems with over 160K GitHub stars.

events.title: AI Healthcare Conference
events.location: The Stanford Faculty Club, Stanford, CA
events.description: T.H.I.N.K. 2026 will gather leading clinicians, technologists, and entrepreneurs to explore AI-driven innovations transforming personalized care and population health, aiming to create smarter, more equitable healthcare systems.

events.title: Domain2Demo Hackathon
events.description: Domain2Demo will bring together developers, AI experts, and digital real estate investors for a dynamic hackathon and summit where teams draft premium domains to build AI-driven products, enjoy workshops on Web3 and digital assets, and compete for cash prizes, all supported by top industry mentors and exclusive tech partners.
